verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
You are an awesome God (awesome)
Mighty God
I give you praise
Awesome God (Repeat)
I give You praise x4
You are high and lifted up
Awesome God
You are high and lifted up
Awesome God!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Iya, iya oohh iya iya x?
I give You praise x3
You are awesome God (Repeat)
Ohhâ€¦ Awesome God!
Tout le monde madjunda (Let us dance everybody) x3
Madjunda, madjunda, madjunda (dance x3)
(Repeat x?)

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Say all the glory (all the glory)
All the honour (all the honour)
All the praise (all the praise)
(You deserve it)
